text: Belgium has been in most Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Belgium is BEL. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-8-16. ==History== Athletes from Belgium competed for the first time was at the 1900 Games. The nation was host to the 1920 Summer Olympics in Antwerp. Belgian athletes have won 142 medals at the Summer Olympic Games, and another five at the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Belgium was formed and recognized in 1906. ==List of medalists== ===Summer Olympics=== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1924 Paris Boxing Men's welterweight 1924 Paris
